sentences.sentence: Louise said there was some sort of a peculiar menage she ran into up here.
sentences.translation: 露意丝说她来的时候看见这里有一种特别的组织。

sentences.sentence: He eventually found happiness in a menage a trois with a married policeman and his wife.
sentences.translation: 最终，他和一对警察夫妻过上了幸福的三人生活。

sentences.sentence: Visitors are flocking to see the characters in an unusual menage a trois at San Francisco zoo.
sentences.translation: 游客们正聚集起来，观看旧金山动物园里一场不寻常的三角恋中的角色。
